meanings.definition: Of or relating to coins or money.
meanings.sent1: The nummular collection showcased rare coins from around the world.
meanings.sent2: The nummular currency exchange rate fluctuated daily.
meanings.sent3: The nummular piggy bank was always full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her nummular savings grew steadily over the years.
meanings.sent5: The nummular treasure chest held ancient gold coins.

meanings.definition: Resembling a coin in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The moon shone with a nummular glow in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a nummular sculpture that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The nummular cookies were perfectly round and delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a nummular brightness that captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The pond reflected a nummular image of the full moon.
